content: beautiful design to decorating your home or clothes we use thin yarn of seven different colours red yellow light and dark white brown green light and dark uses a variety of stitches chain double_crochet / single_crochet treble / double_crochet lace stitches includes diagram and instructions for rose + two other flower designs large branches with small flowers and branches with small leaves pdf link http //www mypicot com/patterns/6005 pdf
